alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 2:38PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT GILCHRIST...WEST CENTRAL BRADFORD...NORTHWESTERN ALACHUA...SOUTHWESTERN UNION AND SOUTH CENTRAL COLUMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EST... At 238 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Fort White to near Manattee Road. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Worthington Spring, Alachua, High Springs, Fort White, Worthington Springs, Upland Pines, New River, Newberry, and La Crosse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for northern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua
